word:
“IN FOUR DAYS FROM THIS TIME, WHICH WAS DECEMBER 1ST, HE WAS TAKEN SICK WITH LUNG FEVER, AND RAPIDLY FAILED. FROM HIS ROOM IN THE CHAMBER HE WAS CARRIED INTO ONE OF THE LOWER ROOMS—THE VERY ONE WHERE, SIXTEEN YEARS BEFORE, WHEN BUT AN 
345
INFANT, HE WAS APPARENTLY BROUGHT TO THE POINT OF DEATH.
